plays.text: Penalty to Vladimir Malakhov 2 minutes for Tripping Jan Hrdina
Penalty to Brian Leetch 2 minutes for Tripping Aleksey Morozov
Penalty to Sylvain Lefebvre 2 minutes for Holding Stephane Richer
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 10 minutes for Game Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 5 minutes for Boarding Matthew Barnaby served by Krzysztof Oliwa
Penalty to Josef Melichar 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Brian Leetch assisted by Theo Fleury and Eric Lindros
Penalty to Radek Dvorak 2 minutes for Tripping(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Mark Messier 2 minutes for Hooking Aleksey Morozov
Goal scored by Robert Lang assisted by Janne Laukkanen and Alexei Kovalev
Goal scored by Jan Hrdina assisted by Alexei Kovalev and Robert Lang
Goal scored by Radek Dvorak assisted by Theo Fleury and Igor Ulanov
Penalty to Andrew Ference 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Radek Dvorak
Goal scored by Petr Nedved assisted by Brian Leetch and Radek Dvorak
Penalty to Matthew Barnaby 2 minutes for Slashing Robert Lang
Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Hooking Petr Nedved
Penalty to Petr Nedved 2 minutes for Holding Eric Meloche
Goal scored by Andrew Ference assisted by Aleksey Morozov and Stephane Richer
Goal scored by Matthew Barnaby assisted by Petr Nedved and Radek Dvorak
